name: variants.world
description:
A service enabling users of chess.com to suggest and discuss new chess variants.
Stack: `AstroJS`, `Preact`, `Prisma` + `Supabase`, `PostgreSQL`, `Tailwind`.
Responsibilities: design and implementation, database design, unit testing.

name: ostis-deploy
description:
A platform designed for university students, providing them with the capability to host and conveniently access their knowledge bases.
Stack: `Deno`, `Fresh`, `Docker`, `GitHub App`, `Tailwind`.
Responsibilities: design and implementation of the functionality, github auth implementation, ui/ux.

name: pie-tunes
description:
A streaming platform, featuring a recommendation system built upon a graph-based knowledge base. (Course project)
Stack: `Spring Boot` (Security, Web), `MinIO`, `Preact`, `Redux`, `Gradle`, `Docker`.
Responsibilities: design, implementation of the RESTfull service, knowledgebase design, ui/ux.

name: http-server
description:
A simple implementation of an http server using Java NIO, allowing you to create simple web applications.
Stack: `Java`.
Responsibilities: design and implementation.

name: dnd-lists
description:
An application designed for crafting and modifying character sheets for the Dungeons & Dragons game.
Stack: `Spring Boot` (Security, Web, Data JPA), `PostgreSQL`, `TypeScript`, `Preact`, `Redux`, `Bootstrap`.
Responsibilities: frontend design and implementation, database design, auth implementation, implementation service functionality.
